summary: This document is an email chain discussing a Daily Mail interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison. The initial email alerts recipients to the interview's publication, and a follow-up email requests the full interview when it becomes available.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview conducted while she is incarcerated. The email chain is about obtaining and discussing this interview.

events.title: Daily Mail Interview with Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison, marking the first time she has spoken from behind bars.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison to the Daily Mail, which was published on or around November 14, 2021.
The interview was noted as the first time Maxwell had spoken from behind bars.
The document is an internal email chain showing coordination to obtain and share the full interview content.
